definition: to dislike/suspicion/resentment/enmity/abbr. for 嫌犯[xian2 fan4], criminal suspect
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: The ICC must decide whether to indict the suspects.
sentences.chinese: 国际刑事法庭必须决定是否起诉这些嫌犯。

sentences.english: Jack subdues the suspect but realizes Hampton has been shot.
sentences.chinese: 杰克制服了嫌犯，但他发现杰西被子弹击中了。

sentences.english: The government says a suspect arrested last month, Najibullah Zazi, traveled to Pakistan last year to train in weapons and explosives.
sentences.chinese: 该名嫌犯曾于去年在巴基斯坦进行武器和炸药的培训。
重庆黑帮嫌犯接受审判。

sentences.english: Jack directs Jessie not to shoot the suspect because he needs him alive.
sentences.chinese: 杰克指示杰西不要射杀嫌犯，他需要活捉嫌犯。

sentences.english: Jack directs Jessie not to shoot the suspect because he needs him alive.
sentences.chinese: 杰克指示杰西不要射杀嫌犯，他需要活捉嫌犯。

sentences.english: The suspect who fled was arrested on suspicion of being drunk in public and resisting arrest.
sentences.chinese: 逃走的那名嫌犯因涉嫌公然酗酒及拒捕而遭到逮捕。

sentences.english: The suspected drug dealer will be returned to the US on January 5.
sentences.chinese: 这名嫌犯将于1月5日被移交回美国。

sentences.english: Jack flashes his badge and tells her he’s after a suspect.
sentences.chinese: 杰克亮出了他的证件，称自己是在追击嫌犯。

sentences.english: Officers should also act with restraint before freezing the account of an operating firm suspected of committing crimes, according to Zheng.
sentences.chinese: 对涉嫌犯罪企业的正常经营账户要慎用冻结措施。

sentences.english: Hotch: The unsubs are watching and waiting for the best target.
sentences.chinese: 不明嫌犯等候最佳的目标，伺机下手。

sentences.english: China detains chief suspect in steel exec's death.
sentences.chinese: 涉嫌殴打通话钢厂总经理致死的嫌犯在长春被捕。

sentences.english: "There was insufficient evidence that the statements (of the suspects) constituted a true threat," Eid said.
sentences.chinese: 没有足够的证据表明嫌犯说的话构成切实的威胁。

sentences.english: The witness averred that he had seen the suspect at the scene of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 证人断言他看到嫌犯出现在犯罪现场。

sentences.english: The woman eventually attacked members of government-backed Sunni groups in Diyala province, the suspect said.
sentences.chinese: 嫌犯说，老师最后袭击了有政府背景的某逊尼派团体。

sentences.english: Grand theft auto, larceny, robbery, arson, and suspected of murder in Oklahoma.
sentences.chinese: 偷车，盗窃，抢劫，纵火额赫拉荷马州谋杀嫌犯。

definition: alleged killer (or attacker)/suspect in a case of violent crime
to commit a crime or offence
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
